languages.text: {n}Маражай растягивает губы в улыбке и лениво манит вас рукой.{/n} "Подойди, мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}. Я вижу, как тебя снедает желание быть ближе".
{n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile and he beckons indolently at you.{/n} "Come, my little pet. I see how your desire to be near consumes you."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай растягивает губы в улыбке и лениво манит вас рукой.{/n} "Подойди, мо{mf|й|я} маленьк{mf|ий|ая} звер{mf|ек|ушка}. Я вижу, как тебя снедает желание быть ближе".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile and he beckons indolently at you.{/n} "Come closer, my little pet. I see how your desire to be near consumes you."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sonríe y te llama con un gesto indolente.{/n} «Ven, mascotita mía. Veo que tu deseo de proximidad te consume».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile and he beckons indolently at you.{/n} "Come, my little pet. I see how your desire to be near consumes you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sonríe y te llama con un gesto indolente.{/n} «Acércate, mascotita mía. Veo que tu deseo de proximidad te consume».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋嘴角绽放出一丝微笑，肆无忌惮地朝招着手。{/n}“过来吧，我的小宠物。我已经看到，你无法克制渴望亲近我的欲望。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile and he beckons indolently at you.{/n} "Come, my little pet. I see how your desire to be near consumes you."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋嘴角绽放出一丝微笑，肆无忌惮地朝招着手。{/n}“过来吧，我的小宠物。我已经看到，你无法克制渴望亲近我的欲望。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは唇を広げて笑みを浮かべ、無邪気にあなたを手招きする。{/n}「近くへ来いよ、俺の可愛いペット。俺のそばにいたくてたまらないというお前の願望が見えるぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile and he beckons indolently at you.{/n} "Come, my little pet. I see how your desire to be near consumes you."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは唇を広げて笑みを浮かべ、無邪気にあなたを手招きする。{/n}「近くへ来いよ、俺の可愛いペット。俺のそばにいたくてたまらないというお前の願望が見えるぞ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent en un sourire et il vous adresse un signe indolent.{/n} « Approchez, {mf|mon petit|ma petite} esclave. Je vois bien à quel point vous brûlez de sentir ma présence tout près de vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile and he beckons indolently at you.{/n} "Come, my little pet. I see how your desire to be near consumes you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les lèvres de Marazhai s'étirent en un sourire et il vous adresse un signe indolent.{/n} « Approchez, {mf|mon petit|ma petite} esclave. Je vois bien à quel point vous brûlez de sentir ma présence tout près de vous. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais Lippen verziehen sich zu einem Grinsen und er winkt dich träge herbei.{/n} "Kommt, mein kleines Haustier. Ich sehe doch, wie sehr Euch Euer Verlangen verzehrt, in meiner Nähe zu sein."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile and he beckons indolently at you.{/n} "Come, my little pet. I see how your desire to be near consumes you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais Lippen verziehen sich zu einem Grinsen und er winkt dich träge herbei.{/n} "Kommt näher, mein kleines Haustier. Ich sehe doch, wie sehr Euch Euer Verlangen verzehrt, in meiner Nähe zu sein."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile and he beckons indolently at you.{/n} "Come, my little pet. I see how your desire to be near consumes you."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gülümsüyor, miskin bir şekilde seni çağırıyor.{/n} "Gel benim yavrum. İhtirasla kavruluyorsun, görüyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's lips stretch into a smile and he beckons indolently at you.{/n} "Come, my little pet. I see how your desire to be near consumes you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gülümsüyor, miskin bir şekilde seni çağırıyor.{/n} "Gel benim yavrum. İhtirasla kavruluyorsun, görüyorum."
